title: Three by Finney: The Woodrow Wilson Dime / The Night People / Marion's Wall
description: This handsome new book combines three Finney favorites (The Woodrow Wilson Dime, Marion's Wall, The Night People) in an omnibus edition that brilliantly displays his bold and unmistakable imagination. Certain to delight anyone with a penchant for penetrating imaginary realms of fantasy and adventure.
author: Jack Finney
